mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images and reducing elements that require heavy loading on mobile devices to improve responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Use image compression techniques and minimize unnecessary scripts to enhance page load speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword usage and meta descriptions to increase visibility in search results.
userExperienceTip: Ensure easy navigation with clearer call-to-action buttons and a more streamlined interface.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps required to complete a reservation.
tips: Add more interactive elements for customer engagement.
